summary.text: Fullstack engineer with 7+ years of experience in building scalable web applications and complex systems. Led frontend and backend initiatives from scratch, scaled MVPs to production, and built tooling that enabled teams to move faster. Proactive, fast-learning and tech-agnostic - always focused on delivering working software with impact. Looking to join a product team where I can help ship fast, iterate, and own tech decisions.

responsibilities: Improved application performance and reduced bundle size by optimizing rendering and dependencies
Enhanced system observability and stability by integrating better logging, metrics, and error tracking
Coordinated a cross-team initiative to deliver multi-app features with consistent architecture and shared components
Built several B2B and B2C products in insurance and online travel
Took full ownership of features: from planning to production
Acted as team lead on multiple projects: code review, mentoring, estimation
Initiated internal dev-talks and introduced tooling that improved delivery speed
Built food delivery and e-learning platforms with complex business logic
Delivered cross-platform apps using React Native and Ionic
Developed an online sportsbook platform from scratch
Optimized rendering and state management for real-time betting
Created UI components for large enterprise systems
Communicated directly with clients, participated in planning and demos

education.degree: Bachelor's in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science
